documentation.title: Return Type Declaration
documentation.standard: Return type declarations are optional, and have a specified amount of spaces between the function's closing parenthesis and colon, and a specified amount of spaces between the colon and the return type. The default is zero spaces between closing parenthesis and colon and one space between colon and return type.

code.title: Valid: Zero spaces between closing parenthesis and colon, one space between colon and return type.
Invalid: One space between closing parenthesis and colon, zero spaces between colon and return type.
